properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.atomix
properties.description: The Atomix instance to use. The option is a io.atomix.Atomix type.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.configuration
properties.description: The shared component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.atomix.client.map.AtomixMapConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.configuration-uri
properties.description: The path to the AtomixClient configuration

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.default-action
properties.description: The default action.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.default-resource-config
properties.description: The cluster wide default resource configuration. The option is a java.util.Properties type.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.default-resource-options
properties.description: The local default resource options. The option is a java.util.Properties type.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the atomix-map component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.ephemeral
properties.description: Sets if the local member should join groups as PersistentMember or not. If set to ephemeral the local member will receive an auto generated ID thus the local one is ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.key
properties.description: The key to use if none is set in the header or to listen for events for a specific key. The option is a java.lang.Object type.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.nodes
properties.description: The nodes the AtomixClient should connect to

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.read-consistency
properties.description: The read consistency level.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.resource-configs
properties.description: Cluster wide resources configuration.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.resource-options
properties.description: Local resources configurations

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.result-header
properties.description: The header that wil carry the result.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.transport-class-name
properties.description: The class name (fqn) of the Atomix transport

properties.name: camel.component.atomix-map.ttl
properties.description: The resource ttl. The option is a long type.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.address
properties.description: The address of the node - node only.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.attributes
properties.description: Custom service attributes.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.configuration-uri
properties.description: The Atomix configuration uri.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.enabled
properties.description: Sets if the atomix cluster service should be enabled or not, default is false.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.ephemeral
properties.description: Sets if the local member should join groups as PersistentMember or not (node only).

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.mode
properties.description: Sets the cluster mode.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.nodes
properties.description: The address of the nodes composing the cluster.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.order
properties.description: Service lookup order/priority.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.storage-level
properties.description: The storage mode - node only.

properties.name: camel.component.atomix.cluster.service.storage-path
properties.description: The storage directory - node only.
